title: Browse product categories
user_story: As a user, I want to browse categories so that I can find products of interest.
acceptance_criteria: Category menu is visible in the top navigation.
Clicking a category navigates to a filtered product listing.
Product listings match the selected category.

title: Search for products
user_story: As a user, I want to search for products using keywords so I can find relevant items quickly.
acceptance_criteria: Search bar is present on every page.
Search results display products matching the keyword in title or description.
If no products are found, a 'no results' message is shown.

title: View product details
user_story: As a user, I want to see detailed information about a product before making a purchase decision.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a product opens the product detail page.
Product detail includes name, price, image, description, and variants.
Rating and review sections are visible.

title: Add product to cart
user_story: As a user, I want to add products to my cart so that I can purchase them later.
acceptance_criteria: Product detail page has an 'Add to Cart' button.
After adding, the cart is updated and shows confirmation.
Out-of-stock products cannot be added.

title: Update cart items
user_story: As a user, I want to modify the quantity or remove items in my cart before checking out.
acceptance_criteria: Quantity can be increased or decreased in cart.
Item can be removed from cart.
Cart total updates dynamically.

title: Proceed to checkout
user_story: As a user, I want to proceed from cart to checkout to complete my purchase.
acceptance_criteria: Cart has a clearly visible checkout button.
Clicking checkout navigates to the checkout page.
Guest checkout option is shown only when cart is not empty.

title: Guest checkout
user_story: As a guest, I want to checkout without creating an account.
acceptance_criteria: Guest checkout form collects full billing/shipping info.
All required fields are validated.
User is able to place an order without logging in.

title: Register a new account
user_story: As a new user, I want to register an account so I can track my orders.
acceptance_criteria: Register form is accessible from login page.
All required fields must be filled and validated.
User is redirected to My Account page after successful registration.

title: Login to account
user_story: As a returning user, I want to login so I can view my account and order history.
acceptance_criteria: Login form accepts valid credentials.
Invalid login shows error message.
Successful login redirects to My Account dashboard.

title: View My Account dashboard
user_story: As a logged-in user, I want to access my account dashboard to manage orders and settings.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays links to all account sections.
User greeting is shown with their name.
User can navigate to features like order history, address book, etc.

title: Sort products on category page
user_story: As a user, I want to sort products by price or name so that I can easily compare options.
acceptance_criteria: Sort dropdown is available on category pages.
User can sort by 'Price: Low to High', 'Name A-Z', etc.
Product list updates accordingly after sorting.

title: View product reviews
user_story: As a user, I want to read reviews from other customers so I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: Reviews tab is available on the product detail page.
Reviews include star rating and user comments.
Average product rating is displayed.

title: Apply shipping method
user_story: As a user, I want to choose a shipping method at checkout so I can decide delivery speed.
acceptance_criteria: Available shipping options are displayed during checkout.
User can choose between standard and express methods.
Selected option affects the order total.

title: Apply payment method
user_story: As a user, I want to select a payment method to complete the order.
acceptance_criteria: Checkout page shows available payment methods.
User can select the desired payment option.
Order proceeds only after payment method selection.

title: Add separate shipping address
user_story: As a user, I want to add a separate shipping address if different from billing.
acceptance_criteria: Checkbox toggles visibility of shipping form.
Shipping address can be filled independently.
Order reflects selected shipping destination.

title: Confirm order
user_story: As a user, I want to review and confirm my order before placing it.
acceptance_criteria: Final summary is displayed before confirmation.
User must agree to terms and conditions.
Clicking confirm submits the order.

title: Track order history
user_story: As a logged-in user, I want to see my past orders for reference.
acceptance_criteria: My Account page has 'Order History' link.
Clicking it displays previous order records.
Order ID, date, and status are visible.

title: Update account details
user_story: As a logged-in user, I want to update my account information when needed.
acceptance_criteria: My Account includes an edit option.
User can modify name, email, phone.
Changes are saved after validation.

title: Manage address book
user_story: As a user, I want to manage my addresses for easier checkout in future.
acceptance_criteria: User can add, edit, or delete addresses.
Address form includes all necessary fields.
Changes are reflected in future checkouts.

title: Log out from account
user_story: As a user, I want to log out securely when done with my session.
acceptance_criteria: Logout link is available in header or account menu.
Clicking it ends the session.
User is redirected to the home page.
